ooC: The most likely reason for a long awaited response is that I 
had to reformat my computer, and i also had spent most of a day 
trying to fix it with out having to reformat. That and i'm absent 
minded. =P

--- Axis ---

Axis enters the base through the main entrance, he stops just 
through the entrance, and turns around, "Again, welcome to the 
Chivitrons' base. Now, if you will please follow me," Axis heads to 
the end of the hall, and waits for the rest to catch up.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Uh, what about Hazel and her comrades? I had them follow Axis 
into the base and then never got a reply. How come?
